mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food( food_num, comp_num, food_name, food_price, food_quantity, food_content, food_photo1, food_photo1_name, food_photo2, food_photo2_name, food_status) VALUES( food_seq.nextval, #{comp_num}, #{food_name}, #{food_price}, #{food_quantity}, #{food_content}, #{food_photo1}, #{food_photo1_name}, #{food_photo2}, #{food_photo2_name}, #{food_regdate}, #{food_modifydate}, #{food_status} )
